title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description:
Gather and document the project's scope, objectives, and functional and non-functional requirements, including user stories, technical specifications, and constraints. Ensure to consider the following aspects: 

1. User Experience: Define the target audience, their needs, and desired user experience for the platform.
2. Historical and Future Scenarios: Identify the initial set of historical periods and future scenarios to be simulated, and the criteria for selecting and adding new ones.
3. Educational and Entertainment Elements: Determine the balance between educational and entertainment aspects, and how they will be integrated.
4. Simulation Fidelity: Establish the desired level of realism and accuracy for the simulations.
5. Scalability and Performance: Consider the expected user load and define scalability and performance requirements.
6. Security and Privacy: Identify potential security and privacy concerns, and define measures to address them.
7. Monetization and Business Model: Explore potential revenue streams and business models for the platform.
8. Compliance and Legal: Identify any relevant legal and regulatory requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, modules, and their interactions, as well as the technology stack and infrastructure requirements. Consider the following aspects: scalability, performance, security, data management, simulation engine, user interface, and integration with external services (e.g., payment gateways, historical data sources).

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the time-travel tourism platform, including wireframes, mockups, and prototypes.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services and APIs required for the time-travel simulation, including data management, business logic, and integration with external services.

title: Develop Frontend Application
description: Implement the frontend application for the time-travel tourism platform, including the user interface, interactions, and integration with backend services.

title: Set up Database and Data Management
description: Design and implement the database schema and data management strategies for storing and retrieving simulation data, user profiles, and other relevant information.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect user data, prevent unauthorized access, and ensure the overall security of the platform.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated builds, testing, and deployment of the application to various environments.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute various testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, performance testing, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the quality and reliability of the platform.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including technical documentation, user guides, and training materials, to support the deployment and usage of the platform.
